nodes.text: J. P. Rutter is a British comic book writer who has written for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK.
His first story was "Hunted", set on the planet Asuin, was published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.16.
"Hypermatters", which introduced bounty hunter villain Volan Das was first published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.40 and in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic US 15.

"Lockdown" was first published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars UK 6.47 and continues the Hypermatters arc. Volan Das meets the secretive Arlain Zee and takes part in a prison breakout onboard the Tempestuous.
